page.shortlink: api client api a5 buttontoggle getvalue method

argument.name: buttons
argument.description: The specific BUTTON elements to get the value(s) of.

return.name: value
return.description: The value(s) of the toggle button(s).

page.description: Get the value of some or all of the BUTTON elements bound to the A5.ButtonToggle control.

discussion.p: If more then one button is bound to the A5.ButtonToggle and no explicit buttons are passed in, or multiple buttons are passed in, an array of values will be returned. If a single button is bound, or a single button is passed in, the state of the button will be returned as a boolean if the button is "two-state", or a number if the button is "multi-state".
